translation.en: -Mommy, I'm sleepy. -Shh, shh.
Shh, shh. Let's go.
Daddy.
"Shoop."
We're gonna do "Shoop" later.
-"Shoop." -Shh, shh.
What are you doing?
-[banging on hood] -Hey, what are you doing?
Hey, wait!
Ten on 2, please.
[Tania on voicemail] Leave a message or don't, you do you.
translation.it: Lasciate un messaggio, oppure no, decidete voi.

translation.en: Leave a message or don't, you do you.
translation.it: Lasciate un messaggio, oppure no, decidete voi.

translation.en: I'm gonna find us some place to sleep. I'll be right back.
translation.it: Vado a cercare un posto per dormire. Torno subito.

translation.en: -Alex? -Thank God you're here.
translation.it: - Alex? - Grazie a Dio sei qui.

translation.en: I'm sorry to barge in like this. I called you, you didn't pick up.
translation.it: Scusa se irrompo così, ti ho chiamata, ma non rispondevi.

translation.en: -I didn't know where else to go. -What's wrong? Are you okay?
translation.it: - Non sapevo dove altro andare. - Che c'è? Stai bene?

translation.en: It's not Maddy, is it?
No, Maddy and I just need a place to crash for tonight.
translation.it: No, io e lei abbiamo solo bisogno di un posto per stanotte.

translation.en: Can I crash here until I figure out what I'm doing?
translation.it: Posso fermarmi qui finché non capisco cosa fare?

translation.en: God, of course. Get in here.
-Are the guys from the Swan here? -Yeah.
translation.it: - I ragazzi dello Swan sono qui? - Sì.

translation.en: Thought I heard your voice. Come inside. We got some sick dank from Humboldt.
translation.it: Mi pareva la tua voce. Entra. Humboldt ci ha dato della roba pazzesca.

translation.en: -[man 1] Gotta get it. -[man 2] Do it.
-Yeah. -All right. Pass it. Chill.
Hey.
-Next time. -Come on. He's already on his way over.
translation.it: - La prossima volta. - Dai. Sta già venendo qui.

translation.en: He knows he drank too much. Hear him out. He wants to talk.
translation.it: Lo sa che ha bevuto troppo. Ascoltalo. Vuole parlarti.

translation.en: -Don't be a bitch. -Ethan!
-Sorry-- -I'm good. I'm all right.
It's okay.
-Do you have some place to go? -I'm good.
translation.it: - Sai dove andare? - Sono a posto.

translation.en: -[cell phone pings] -Mm-mm.
translation.it: TANIA HAI UN POSTO DOVE ANDARE?

translation.en: "Shoop" is asleep, Maddy.
Can you try to close your eyes?
translation.it: Prova a chiudere gli occhi, eh?

translation.en: Okay, I know you want "Shoop."
I know you want "Shoop."
Mommy wants to ask the last owner if he jammed any other mixtape in here.
translation.it: Mamma vuole chiedere all'ex proprietario se ha incastrato altre cassette qui.

translation.en: -Hey, there we go. There we go. -["Shoop" playing over stereo]
[Maddy] Mommy.
That's okay. We're gonna freestyle it. That's what we're gonna do.
translation.it: Non c'è problema. Facciamo un po' di freestyle. Facciamo così.

translation.en: ♪ You're packed and you're stacked 'Specially in the back ♪
translation.it: Sei pronta e ben fornita Soprattutto sul didietro

translation.en: ♪ Brother, wanna thank your mother For a butt like that ♪
translation.it: Amico, voglio ringraziare tua madre Per un culo così

translation.en: ♪ Can I get some fries With that shake-shake booty ♪
translation.it: Mi dai delle patatine Con quelle bocce da shakerare

translation.en: ♪ If looks could kill... ♪
Gotta move, ma'am. You can't sleep here.
translation.it: Deve spostarsi. Non può dormire qui.

translation.en: Ma'am.
You can't sleep here.
-Isn't this public property? -You can't park here.
translation.it: - Non è suolo pubblico? - Non può parcheggiare qui.

translation.en: Got nowhere to be, go to a Walmart parking lot or to social services.
translation.it: Se non sa dove andare, vada al parcheggio del Walmart o ai servizi sociali.

translation.en: Okay.
Now.
Okay.
[man] Russell.
That's us. Let's get it.
-Russell? -[Alex] Russell, coming.
So you're looking for a big, fat government handout
translation.it: E così speri in un grosso contributo del governo

translation.en: because you are a jobless, white trash, piece of shit, am I right?
translation.it: perché sei solo feccia bianca, un pezzo di merda disoccupato, giusto?

translation.en: What?
Your form? You're gonna give that to me.
translation.it: Il suo modulo? Deve darlo a me.

translation.en: Yes.
All right. The child in your lap is Maddy.
translation.it: Ok. La bambina che ha in braccio è Maddy.

translation.en: -And Schmariel. -What?
Uh, it's the Ariel that we got from a dollar store.
translation.it: È Ariel, ma la versione del negozio Tutto a un dollaro.

translation.en: So we call her Schmariel.
-Are you the child's legal guardian? -[Alex] Yes.
translation.it: - È lei il suo tutore legale? - Sì.

translation.en: Can you prove that?
Uh, I can show you my stretch marks.
Are you under the influence of any drugs or alcohol?
translation.it: È sotto l'effetto di qualche droga o alcol?

translation.en: Are you sure?
Because you look strung out.
We slept in a car last night.
So you're homeless?
No. No, I wouldn't say that.
So you have a home?
I had a home and then we left it.
translation.it: Avevo una casa, ce ne siamo andate.

translation.en: Maddy's dad is, um-- He drinks and, uh...
translation.it: Il padre di Maddy è... Beve e...

translation.en: He blacks out and punches stuff.
translation.it: Sviene e poi si mette a dare pugni a tutto.

translation.en: Is this some kind of fucking fairy tale, Alex?
translation.it: È una specie di favola del cazzo, Alex?

translation.en: -[Jody] Punches you? -No.
-Punches Maddy? -[Alex] No. No.
Just...
Last night, um...
Last night was different and I got scared.
translation.it: È stato diverso, mi sono spaventata.

translation.en: Did you file a police report?
Do you wanna call the cops now? It's not too late.
translation.it: Vuole chiamare la polizia? Fa ancora in tempo.

translation.en: And say what? That he didn't hit me?
translation.it: E che dico? Che non mi ha picchiato?

translation.en: There's shelters for domestic violence victims,
translation.it: Ci sono centri per le vittime di violenza domestica,

translation.en: but you need to go on record with your abuse.
I'm not abused.
Okay, hon.
So according to you, you're not abused and you're not homeless.
translation.it: Quindi, a quanto dice lei, non viene maltrattata e non è senza dimora.

translation.en: Why are you here?
We don't have anywhere to sleep tonight.
What about mom? It says here she's local.
translation.it: E sua madre? Qui dice che è del posto.

translation.en: I would rather sleep in my car.
Dad?
My family is not an option.
translation.it: La mia famiglia non è un'opzione.

translation.en: Are you currently employed?
-Nope. -You went to six different high schools?
translation.it: - No. - Ha frequentato sei licei diversi?

translation.en: Yeah, my mom moved around a lot and then eventually I got my GED in 2016.
translation.it: Sì, mamma si trasferiva spesso. Alla fine, mi sono diplomata nel 2016.

translation.en: Any college, technical schools?
I got into college...
um, but I didn't go.
Is there anything that you can give me?
Any special skills?
On your mark, get set, go!
All right. Here's the deal.
I need two pay stubs in order to get you on the list for subsidized housing,
translation.it: Mi servono due buste paga per metterla in lista per una casa popolare,

translation.en: and even then, the wait list is long.
translation.it: e anche in tal caso, l'elenco è lungo.

translation.en: In the meantime, there's a mission over at St. Carmel's and they have beds open.
translation.it: Nel frattempo, c'è una missione a St. Carmel, di solito hanno posto.

translation.en: I can't take Maddy there.
Sure you can.
Get there early. Wear Deet.
translation.it: Arrivi presto. Si spruzzi un antizanzare.

translation.en: Um, I'm sorry. Is there anything else that you could do for us here?
translation.it: Mi scusi, qui non potete fare nient'altro per noi?

translation.en: Honestly, without a job,
I can't do squat.
Okay. Um...
I can't get a job if I can't afford day care.
translation.it: Ma come trovo lavoro se non posso pagare l'asilo?

translation.en: Well, we have access to subsidized day care grants once you have a job.
translation.it: Quando avrà un lavoro, avremo accesso a dei fondi per gli asili pubblici.

translation.en: I need a job to prove that I need day care in order to get a job?
translation.it: Serve un lavoro per dimostrare che mi serve un asilo per lavorare?

translation.en: What kind of fuckery is that?
You know what?
Why don't you try this?
It's a local cleaning service, lot of turnover. Worth a shot.
translation.it: È un'impresa di pulizie locale, c'è molto ricambio. Vale la pena tentare.

translation.en: I'll call them to tell them you're on your way.
translation.it: Chiamo per avvisarli che sta andando lì.

translation.en: -Great. Yeah. Thank you. -[Jody] Yeah?
Can I bring Maddy?
To a job interview?
Mom!
Is Paula here?
I don't know who Paula is. We Airbnb'd this place from Basil.
translation.it: Non so chi sia. Abbiamo affittato questo posto tramite Airbnb, da Basil.

translation.en: -Hi, Mom. -[shouts]
This is so exciting.
I can't believe you came to see this.
translation.it: Non ci credo, sei venuta a vedere qui.

translation.en: This is what all the brilliant painters and sculptors are doing in the art world.
translation.it: Questo è ciò che fanno adesso tutti i pittori e scultori geniali.

translation.en: This is me stepping up to a global collective of minds.
translation.it: Sto avanzando verso un collettivo di menti di livello mondiale.

translation.en: -Hey, Mom. -Archetypes. You know about it.
translation.it: - Ciao, mamma. - Gli archetipi. Lo sai cosa sono.

translation.en: That's what I'm representing here in cobalt.
translation.it: Ecco cosa sto rappresentando qui, in cobalto.

translation.en: The hero, the every man, mentor, the mystic -the lover. -Mom.
translation.it: - Eroe, uomo comune, mentore, amante. - Mamma.

translation.en: And there's Jungian archetypes.
translation.it: E ci sono gli archetipi junghiani.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me that you Airbnb'd your house?
translation.it: Perché non mi hai detto che hai affittato casa?

translation.en: I did, didn't I?
I drove around two campgrounds looking for you.
translation.it: Ho girato due campeggi per trovarti.

translation.en: If you don't check-in with me, that's on you.
translation.it: Se non mi chiami mai, è colpa tua.

translation.en: I called you 14 times.
[Basil] Is that Alexandra? Bloody hell.
You disturbed the Airbnb people?
They're gonna leave a shit review now, you fair dinkum monster.
translation.it: Lasceranno una recensione di merda, sei un mostro.

translation.en: I can't deal with him and his fake Australian accent.
translation.it: Non lo sopporto, lui e il suo finto accento australiano.

translation.en: It's not fake. I was born in Perth, so...
translation.it: Non è finto. Sono nato a Perth, quindi...

translation.en: -I'm sure you were, Cilantro. -Don't call Basil Cilantro, Alex.
translation.it: - Di sicuro, Coriandolo. - Non chiamare Basil "Coriandolo", Alex.

translation.en: Our identity is subjective.
He's Australian, I'm French-Italian.
In reality, we're both 100 percent Icelandic fairy.
translation.it: In realtà siamo entrambi folletti islandesi, al 100%.

translation.en: Can I talk to you in private? I'm in a rush, Mom.
translation.it: Posso parlarti in privato? Sono di corsa.

translation.en: No. Whatever you can say to me, you can say in front of him.
translation.it: No. Qualsiasi cosa sia, puoi dirla davanti a lui.

translation.en: Because he is my life and business partner.
translation.it: È il mio partner, nella vita e negli affari.

translation.en: What business?
Renting your house out, or making you sleep in an RV?
translation.it: Affittare casa tua o farti dormire in un camper?

translation.en: You're a malignant tumor.
-Go put some shrimp on the barbie. -All right. Enough.
translation.it: - Vai a mettere i gamberetti sul barbecue. - Ok. Basta.

translation.en: Out with it.
-With--? Um... -Out with it.
You want something from me, so just ask. What is it?
translation.it: Vuoi qualcosa da me, chiedimelo. Di che si tratta?

translation.en: Can you watch Maddy? I have a job interview. One hour, two max.
translation.it: Puoi tenere Maddy? Ho un colloquio di lavoro. Due ore al massimo.

translation.en: Of course. She's my granddaughter.
She is always welcome to experience me and be a part of my life.
translation.it: È sempre la benvenuta qui, per conoscermi e far parte della mia vita.

translation.en: Do you remember the rules? Use your phone.
translation.it: Ricordi le regole? Usa il telefono.

translation.en: Use your phone and answer the phone. Okay, Mom?
translation.it: Usa il telefono e rispondi alle chiamate. Ok, mamma?

translation.en: -Nod that you hear me. -Nod.
translation.it: - Fammi un cenno se hai capito. - Sì.

translation.en: Don't drive her anywhere. Do you have food here? Can you give her lunch?
translation.it: Niente giri in auto. Hai da mangiare qui? Puoi farle il pranzo?

translation.en: -We're a pub now, are we? -Anything goes wrong, call me.
translation.it: - Siamo un pub? - Se hai problemi, chiama me.

translation.en: Don't call Sean. Call me.
Come on, pumpky-poo.
Be a good girl for Grammy and Cilantro. Love you.
translation.it: Fai la brava con Nanna e Coriandolo. Ti voglio bene.

translation.en: [Maddy] Bye, Mom!
I love you!
Put some eyes on her.
Hi, I'm looking for Value Maids?
Sorry, the address says it's here.
Thank you.
[Yolanda] Yeah?
Hi, are you Yolanda?
If this is another summons, shove it up your ass.
translation.it: Se è un'altra citazione, ficcatela nel culo.

translation.en: No, I'm Alex. Jody sent me.
translation.it: No, sono Alex. Mi manda Jody.

translation.en: Oh, one of Jody's girls.
Poor thing. Not you. Jody. Being a social worker sucks.
translation.it: Poverina. Non te, ma Jody. Fa schifo fare l'assistente sociale.

translation.en: So you're on parole?
Um, no.
-Got any priors? -No.
I'll check. Got a problem with a background check?
-No. -We pay that, no exceptions.
translation.it: - No. - Paghiamo così, niente eccezioni. 12$ L'ORA NIENTE ATTREZZATURA

translation.en: Bump you up 50 cents once the background check clears and you go full-time.
translation.it: Aumento di 50 centesimi se la fedina penale è pulita e passi a tempo pieno.

translation.en: Full-time, great.
Yes, but full-time ain't a 40-hour week.
translation.it: Sì, ma non sono 40 ore a settimana.

translation.en: Company policy is you can't work more than six hours a day.
translation.it: Non puoi lavorare più di sei ore al giorno.

translation.en: More than six hours, bitches start throwing their backs out,
translation.it: Con più ore alle stronze viene mal di schiena

translation.en: which breaks my heart, it does, but I can't be paying benefits.
translation.it: e mi si spezza il cuore, ma non posso pagare l'indennità.

translation.en: So it's capped. Six hours a day, max.
translation.it: Quindi c'è un limite: massimo sei ore al giorno.

translation.en: Okay.
And tourist season's over, so I really only have one shift open.
translation.it: E la stagione turistica è finita, quindi ho un solo turno disponibile.

translation.en: It's a weekly three-hour clean over on Fisher Island.
translation.it: Tre ore a settimana di pulizie, a Fisher Island.

translation.en: One shift. Okay.
So uniform is 25 bucks. Comes out of your first check.
translation.it: L'uniforme costa 25 dollari. Viene decurtata dal primo assegno.

translation.en: How soon do you think I could get proof of employment? A pay stub.
translation.it: Quanto ci vorrà per avere una prova di occupazione? Una busta paga.

translation.en: Cart before the horse. This is a trial.
translation.it: Il carro davanti ai buoi. Sei in prova.

translation.en: You ain't hired yet.
-You got a car? -Yes.
We provide a ferry pass.
translation.it: Ecco un pass per il traghetto.

translation.en: But gas and toll, that's on you.
translation.it: Benzina e pedaggio li paghi tu, però.

translation.en: So are cleaning supplies, rags, gloves,
basically everything else except the Dyson.
translation.it: in pratica tutto, tranne il Dyson.

translation.en: If you don't return the Dyson to me directly after the shift,
translation.it: Se non me lo restituisci appena finito il turno,

translation.en: -you don't get paid. Understand? -Yes, I do.
All right. Can you do there at 1:00? Let me get you the sheet.
translation.it: Bene. Puoi andare lì per le 13:00? Ti do il foglio.

translation.en: Oh, so I'm starting today?
That's good news, ain't it, broke girl?
Great.
-[Paula on phone] Hello. -[Alex] Hey, Mom. How's it going?
[Paula] She's a very powerful archetype.
A love child. That's what she is, her spirit resounds.
translation.it: Una bambina adorabile. Ecco cos'è: il suo spirito risuona.

translation.en: -Did you feed her? -The spirit of my mother is in her.
translation.it: - L'hai fatta mangiare? - Ha in sé lo spirito di mia madre.

translation.en: She is a very powerful young lady. Our ancestry pulses through her blood.
translation.it: È una signorina davvero potente. I nostri antenati pulsano nelle sue vene.

translation.en: Sure does. Did you end up giving her lunch, though?
translation.it: Di sicuro. Le hai dato da mangiare?

translation.en: Of course. Grilled cheese and tomato with a side of straight Tom Collins
translation.it: Ma certo. Toast con formaggio e pomodori, un Tom Collins liscio per contorno

translation.en: and now we are painting.
-Aren't we, sweetie? We're painting. -Awesome.
translation.it: - Non è così, tesoro? Stiamo dipingendo. - Fantastico.

translation.en: Hey. So listen. I got hired and I'm starting right now.
translation.it: Ehi, ascolta. Mi hanno assunta e inizio subito.

translation.en: You should see what she's doing. And her hands, they're like sculptures.
translation.it: Dovresti vedere cosa sta facendo. E che mani! Sembrano sculture.

translation.en: -Listen, I'm starting right now. -Oh, honey. It's just so pretty.
translation.it: - Ascolta, inizio subito. - Oh, tesoro. È proprio bello.

translation.en: -Her painting. -It's a three-hour clean on Fisher Island.
translation.it: - Il suo quadro. - Farò tre ore di pulizie a Fisher Island.

translation.en: You should see her hands! Look at her hands!
translation.it: Dovresti vedere le sue mani! Ma che belle mani!

translation.en: I'll be back at the ferry at 4:05 and I'll be at yours at 5:30. Does that work?
translation.it: Tornerò col traghetto delle 16:05 e sarò da te alle 17:30. Va bene?

translation.en: Don't we, sweetie?
No phones. You're a half hour late.
translation.it: Niente telefoni. Hai mezz'ora di ritardo.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm-- -A half hour late.
translation.it: - Scusi. Sono... - In ritardo di mezz'ora.

translation.en: I know. I didn't have any signal and missed my turn. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Lo so. Il cellulare non prendeva e mi sono persa. Mi spiace.

translation.en: We'll reschedule.
I can be done by 4:00, ma'am. I'm fast and I'm good.
translation.it: Posso finire per le 16:00, signora. Sono veloce e brava.

translation.en: I'd really rather you come back another time
than do a shoddy job and throw a bunch of cleaning products around.
translation.it: che vederti fare un lavoro scadente e gettare detergenti in giro.

translation.en: I understand. I won't disappoint you.
We're in NYC this weekend. Everything in the fridge can go
translation.it: Nel weekend saremo a New York. Butta via le cose in frigo,

translation.en: so my whole house doesn't smell like kombucha when I get back. Got it?
translation.it: così al ritorno la casa non puzzerà di kombucha. Capito?

translation.en: The fridge. I got it.
We compost. The bin is labeled "compost." Can you read or should I show you?
translation.it: Differenziamo l'umido. Sul bidone c'è scritto "umido". Sai leggere o ti mostro?

translation.en: I can read.
Oh, God. Just put them on. I'll talk to her.
translation.it: Oh, Dio. Passameli. Ci parlo io con lei.

translation.en: Tell them those terms are bullshit.
translation.it: Di' loro che quelle clausole sono stronzate.

translation.en: Okay.
Tick-tock. Should have rescheduled.
[Maddy] Mommy.
It's a tiara.
[Maddy] Mommy, are you okay?
-[Regina] Are you okay? -[Maddy] Are you okay, Mommy?
Are you okay?
Hey.
Why are you on the floor?
Oh, what happened?
I heard a thunk. I think you fainted.
translation.it: Ho sentito un tonfo. Mi sa che sei svenuta.

translation.en: Or are you a drug addict?
Uh, no. Um...
I'm so sorry. I skipped breakfast this morning. I'm fine.
translation.it: Mi scusi. Non ho fatto colazione. Sto bene.

translation.en: Okay, well, just hold on. Don't get up fast.
translation.it: Ok, aspetta. Non alzarti in fretta.

translation.en: Fuck.
Okay.
Balance bar.
Thank you.
This room is so nice.
Gosh, I've got a daughter and she would love this. How old is your kid?
translation.it: Cavoli, mia figlia la adorerebbe. Quanti anni ha sua figlia?

translation.en: I don't have children.
Isn't this a nursery?
translation.it: Non è una camera per bimbi?

translation.en: Yeah, it's staged.
We're getting ready to sell the house. So, uh... James had it staged.
translation.it: Vogliamo vendere la casa e così... James l'ha fatta allestire.

translation.en: Well...
Not to be a task master, but...
Obviously. Of course. I'm almost done too.
translation.it: Ovviamente. Ma certo. Ho quasi finito.

translation.en: I just have this room left and...
This room and all the lawn furniture.
translation.it: Questa camera e l'arredo da giardino.

translation.en: Shit.
[voicemail] Your call has been forwarded to an automatic voice message system.
translation.it: La chiamata è inoltrata al servizio di segreteria telefonica.

translation.en: Your call has been forwarded to an automatic voice message system.
translation.it: La chiamata è inoltrata al servizio di segreteria telefonica.

translation.en: Maddy, are you in here? Maddy?
Mom, can't you hear me calling? What the fuck?
translation.it: Mamma, non hai sentito che ti chiamavo? Cazzo.

translation.en: Calling me? It was me that was calling you many, many times.
translation.it: Tu mi hai chiamata? Sono io che ti ho chiamata, un sacco di volte.

translation.en: -Okay. Where is Maddy? -I have a life of my own, you know?
translation.it: - Ok. Dov'è Maddy? - Ho una vita, sai?

translation.en: I can't be watching children all day. I have work to do. My own work, okay?
translation.it: Non posso badare a bambini tutto il giorno. Ho un lavoro da fare, ok?

translation.en: Basil, are you in here? Open the door!
translation.it: Basil, sei qua? Apri la porta!

translation.en: I bet you'd like to get in there with him. I see how you act around him.
translation.it: Ti piacerebbe stare lì con lui, eh? Lo vedo come ti comporti con lui.

translation.en: Always flirting with him, sticking your little titties out.
translation.it: Ci flirti sempre e tiri fuori quelle tettine.

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about? Where is Maddy?
-I'm taking a nap. Jesus. -Why can't you be happy for me?
translation.it: - Riposavo. Cristo! - Perché non puoi essere felice per me?

translation.en: She's not here.
That I can still attract a quality man like him.
translation.it: Per il fatto che io riesca ancora ad attrarre brav'uomini come lui?

translation.en: -Okay, where is she? -We couldn't reach you
and your mom got tired, so we called Sean to get her.
translation.it: tua mamma era stanca e abbiamo chiesto a Sean di venire a prenderla.

translation.en: You have never seen my potential. I am soaring on the cliff.
translation.it: Non hai mai capito il mio potenziale. Mi libro sulla scogliera.

translation.en: The sun beams towards me. It fills me with light!
translation.it: Il sole splende su di me. Mi riempie di luce!

translation.en: She's fine. She's all right. She's asleep.
translation.it: Sta bene. È a posto. Sta dormendo.

translation.en: We did bath time.
She had buttered noodles.
You hungry?
Dinner's almost ready.
Irish stew.
[screams] Fuck!
I haven't had a drink today. Come on.
translation.it: Oggi non ho bevuto niente. Dai.

translation.en: I'm trying here.
Hey.
I'm not staying for dinner. I'm getting Maddy and I'm leaving.
translation.it: Non resto per cena. Prendo Maddy e me ne vado.

translation.en: I went to a meeting today.
Ethan took me.
Okay. That's...
Could you please sit?
-All right. Let's make a fucking mess! -[Maddy crying]
translation.it: Va bene. Facciamo un casino di merda!

translation.en: Fuck!
You need to eat.
Come on.
I'm surprised Maddy was at your mom's.
translation.it: Mi sorprende che Maddy fosse da tua madre.

translation.en: Is Paula finally on meds, or...?
translation.it: Paula è finalmente in cura o...?

translation.en: She was only supposed to be there a couple of hours.
translation.it: Doveva restare lì solo un paio d'ore.

translation.en: You know how much I love Paula.
translation.it: Sai quanto voglio bene a Paula.

translation.en: I do, but... leaving Maddy with her?
I thought we had an agreement.
My mom's good with her for short periods of time.
translation.it: È brava con Maddy, per brevi periodi.

translation.en: They, um... dance around or do art projects.
She was alone when I got there.
Playing with a vape and watching a cage match on TV.
translation.it: Giocava con una sigaretta elettronica e guardava la lotta in gabbia alla TV.

translation.en: Where were you? Nobody could find you.
I got a job on Fisher Island, and I didn't have service.
translation.it: Ho trovato lavoro a Fisher Island, non c'era campo.

translation.en: A job?
How are you gonna work? Who's gonna watch Maddy?
translation.it: Come farai a lavorare? Chi baderà a Maddy?

translation.en: Not your mom.
I'll figure it out. It's my business, Sean, okay?
translation.it: Troverò una soluzione. Sono affari miei, Sean, ok?

translation.en: Could you eat a little?
You're hurting my feelings.
I'm not eating your fucking stew, okay?
translation.it: Non mangio il tuo cazzo di stufato, ok?

translation.en: Stop asking.
All right.
You're officially freaking me out.
Going AWOL in the middle of the night?
translation.it: Tagliare la corda in piena notte?

translation.en: Leaving my child in a dangerous situation with a batshit crazy person?
translation.it: Lasciare mia figlia in una situazione di pericolo, con una pazza scatenata?

translation.en: I mean, are you feeling okay?
-That's not funny. Don't do that. -What?
translation.it: - Non è divertente. Non farlo. - Cosa?

translation.en: I'm not insane. You're the one that woke me up in a rage
translation.it: Non sono matta. Sei tu che mi hai svegliata tutto arrabbiato

translation.en: over some dirty dishes and punched a hole in the wall.
translation.it: per dei piatti sporchi e hai preso a pugni il muro.

translation.en: I drank too much. I went too far.
I went too far, I'm sorry.
I picked glass out of Maddy's hair last night.
translation.it: Ieri sera ho tolto dei pezzi di vetro dai capelli di Maddy.

translation.en: I didn't mean for it to be that close to her.
Hey, I would never hurt her, you know that.
translation.it: Ehi, non le farei mai del male, lo sai.

translation.en: I don't know that.
You serious right now?
Okay, what's the plan here?
translation.it: Ok, qual è il tuo piano?

translation.en: Where are you gonna go? Hmm?
I pay all the bills.
Let you hang out with my friends,
translation.it: Ti faccio uscire con i miei amici,

translation.en: I let you move into my trailer, you drink my beer, eat my food.
translation.it: ti ho lasciato trasferire da me, bevi la mia birra, mangi il mio cibo.

translation.en: I let you mooch off me.
translation.it: Ti faccio vivere a spese mie.

translation.en: I do everything for you.
If you walk out of here, you'll have no one.
translation.it: Se te ne vai, non avrai nessuno.

translation.en: I know. I'm well aware of how completely alone and fucked I am.
translation.it: Lo so. Lo so benissimo quanto sono sola e incasinata.

translation.en: But I won't pick glass out of Maddy's hair again. Not gonna happen.
translation.it: Ma non toglierò mai più pezzi di vetro dai capelli di Maddy.

translation.en: Hey, where are you going?
-Hey. Hey, Maddy, sweetie. -Daddy.
Daddy's right here, okay?
Where are you going, Alex?
What's the plan here?
Okay, why don't you think for just one second?
translation.it: Ok, perché non ti fermi un attimo a pensare?

translation.en: Would you please look at me? Alex?
Why don't you come back inside?
-We can talk about this. -There you go, honey. It's okay.
translation.it: - Possiamo parlarne. - Ecco fatto, amore. Va tutto bene.

translation.en: Where are you gonna go?
Hey, you can't steal my kid!
translation.it: Non puoi portarmi via mia figlia!

translation.en: Sweetie, Daddy's right here, okay? Where are you gonna go?
translation.it: Tesoro, papà è qui, ok? Alex, dove vuoi andare?

translation.en: Hey! Alex!
[Maddy] "Shoop."
"Shoop," Mommy.
-Where are we going? -I don't know. I need a second, all right?
translation.it: - Dove andiamo? - Non lo so. Mi serve un attimo, ok?

translation.en: -Home. -We can't go home right now, okay?
translation.it: - A casa. - Non possiamo andarci adesso, ok?

translation.en: Look, Mommy, look.
I'm gonna take this real quick.
translation.it: Rispondo un attimo, faccio in fretta.

translation.en: Yolanda, the Dyson, I know.
-Regina's not happy with your cleaning. -What?
translation.it: - Regina non è contenta del tuo lavoro. - Cosa?

translation.en: She called and said you did a crap job on the furniture, left streaks.
translation.it: Ha detto che hai fatto un lavoro di merda con l'arredo esterno.

translation.en: -Go back, and do it right. -Window, Mommy!
translation.it: - Torna là e fallo bene. - Il finestrino, mamma!

translation.en: -Yes, honey. -Mommy.
Okay, okay, hold on. I'm gonna...
Nope, I can't. I'm in Port Hampstead, and I have my daughter with me.
translation.it: Non posso. Sono a Port Hampstead e sono con mia figlia.

translation.en: Not my problem. You want this job? You wanna get paid? Go back.
translation.it: Non è un problema mio. Vuoi il lavoro? Vuoi la paga oggi? Torna là.

translation.en: -It's a 45-minute ferry each way. -Then you better get cracking.
translation.it: - Ci vogliono 45 minuti di traghetto. - Allora muoviti.

translation.en: You're flying. [giggling]
-Hold on, all right? -Look, Mommy.
We don't have time for this, Maddy.
translation.it: Non abbiamo tempo per questo, amore.

translation.en: Schmariel! [screaming]
We'll go back and get Schmariel. We're gonna get Schmariel later.
translation.it: Dopo torniamo lì e andiamo a prendere Schmariel.

translation.en: -I'm getting Schmariel now. -Schmariel!
I'm getting her right now. Okay. All right.
translation.it: Vado a prenderla subito. Ok. Va bene.

translation.en: Okay.
Are you okay?
You okay? You okay?
You're okay. You're okay.
Jesus Christ! She was in there?
Yes, my daughter was fucking in the car! She was in there, you fucking moron!
translation.it: Sì, mia figlia era in macchina! Era lì, coglione di merda!

translation.en: You hit my fucking car. You could have killed my daughter.
translation.it: Hai centrato la mia cazzo di macchina. Potevi ucciderla.

translation.en: Get the fuck away from me!
We live in here, you dipshit!
Oh, you're so good.
And then shine the light.
Yeah.
Here you go, ma'am.
-You're giving me a ticket? -Parking in the meridian is illegal.
translation.it: - Mi ha fatto la multa? - Parcheggiare nell'aiuola è vietato.

translation.en: I can't pay for this.
If you have any personal items you'd like to retrieve from the car
translation.it: Se in auto ha oggetti personali da recuperare

translation.en: before the tow truck gets here, now is your time.
translation.it: prima che arrivi il carro attrezzi, vada ora.

translation.en: And who pays for the tow truck?
translation.it: E chi paga il carro attrezzi?

translation.en: You have someone who can pick you up?
If you don't have anybody to call, we can drop you at home.
translation.it: Se non ha nessuno da chiamare, possiamo accompagnarla a casa.

translation.en: Um, no, no, no. I've got-- I've got somebody. Thank you so much.
translation.it: No. Ho... Ho una persona. Grazie mille.

translation.en: Can you make the call now? I gotta clear the meridian.
translation.it: Può chiamarla ora? Devo sgombrare l'aiuola spartitraffico.

translation.en: -You can't stay here. All right. -Got it.
translation.it: - Non può stare qui. Ok. - Capito.

translation.en: Were you speeding at the time?
Hey.
[Hank] She's out like a light.
Last time I saw her, she was still in diapers.
translation.it: L'ultima volta che l'ho vista usava ancora il pannolino.

translation.en: I would like to see her more than I get to.
So where to? Port Hampstead?
Sean still in that single-wide?
translation.it: Sean sta ancora in quella casa mobile?

translation.en: No, we're, um...
We're not gonna go home.
Oh. Okay.
Where to, then?
I mean, I'd invite you back to my house...
translation.it: Cioè, ti inviterei a casa mia...

translation.en: but it's a school night, and Charlene and the kids--
translation.it: ma domani c'è scuola e Charlene e i bambini...

translation.en: No, yeah. Of course.
Maybe, um...
Would you mind just dropping us at the ferry station?
translation.it: Ci lasceresti alla stazione dei traghetti?

translation.en: I'll have my friend pick us up.
What were you thinking pulled over like that?
translation.it: Che ti è venuto in mente per parcheggiare così?

translation.en: It's just that's... a reckless thing to do.
translation.it: È che... è una cosa talmente sconsiderata.

translation.en: Reminds me of your mother.
translation.it: Mi fa pensare a tua madre.

translation.en: Can we just not talk?
Okay.
Would you mind pulling over real quick and let me run to the dollar store?
translation.it: Puoi accostare un attimo, così faccio un salto a Tutto a un dollaro?

translation.en: Thanks.
Let's put you down. There you go.
translation.it: Adesso ti metto giù. Ecco fatto.

translation.en: You, uh... You need anything else
from your old pop?
We're all set, thanks again.
Bye-bye, honey bee.
Boat.
No, not tonight. We're just gonna get a little rest in.
translation.it: No, stasera no. Adesso ci riposiamo un po'.

translation.en: Wait, wait. Come here, baby girl.
-This was in my shoe. -What's in your shoe?
translation.it: - Era nella mia scarpa. - Cosa c'era nella scarpa?

translation.en: -This was in my shoe. -What the heck?
translation.it: - Era nella mia scarpa. - Che diamine!

translation.en: What the heck?
Okay.
I put it in my shoe.
You're fixing my earrings, all right?
translation.it: Stai mettendo a posto gli orecchini?

translation.en: How do we unclip this?
Well...
Okey-dokey. I got you a surprise. You wanna see a surprise?
translation.it: Va bene. Ho una sorpresa per te. Vuoi vederla?

translation.en: Okay.
Ta-da!
We got Schmariel.
All better.
[woman on PA] Announcing the arrival of Ferry 41.
Ferry 41 arriving.
